Acquired TopWare Interactive in 2001. Renamed itself to TopWare Interactive in 2005. Name retired.
Published games under the Cinemaware Marquee label. Acquired by Tamino Minerals in 2012.
Joint venture between Wei Yen and Nintendo.
Acquired by ZeniMax Media on June 24, 2009
Founded by one of Interplay Entertainment founders; acquired by Microsoft Studios in 2018
Merged with France Telecom Multimedia in 2000 to become Wanadoo Edition.
Developer and publisher; founded by Cai Haoyu, Liu Wei, and Luo Yuhao, three former students from Shanghai Jiao Tong University
Formed by former employees of Love-de-Lic
Acquired by Nepro Japan (currently NJ Holdings [ja]) in 2015
